constituent: current, water, water droplets, water pistol, lifebelt, infant, toddler, top hat, elbow, stream, flood
heisigStory: Water . . . infant . . . flood. Be sure to distinguish the two water primitives from one another in making your story.
koohiiStory1: INFANT Moses placed in the WATER and sent down the current of the STREAM.
koohiiStory2: A water-breathing infant (genetically modified?) is caught in a flood, and drifts with the current, apparently enjoying himself in the process.
kunYomi: なが.れる、なが.れ、なが.す、-なが.す
myStory: dòng chảy. mái nhà có sông nước chảy
readingExamples: 流行 (りゅうこう), 流動 (りゅうどう), 電流 (でんりゅう), 流す (なが.す), 流れる (なが.れる)
words: stream, flow, be washed away, run (ink)
circulation of money or goods, flow of water or air, distribution
clever, adept, good, expectations, as one would expect
flourish, thrive, be popular, come into fashion
